task.summary: Default task
Added image selection
Added image selection
Added image selection
The selection can now be moved around. Boo yeah! B)
The selection can now be expanded. Also added cute little circles to the border ^_^
Darkened the unselected area. Fixed bugs related to drag. A lot of them.
Minor refactoring. Committing for the sake of committing :/
Minor refactoring. Committing for the sake of committing :/
Added DatabaseHelper class. Will be of use later. Hopefully.
Added the Mock-Model. In faint hope that the code might look cleaner.
SQLite Querying Module. I've no clue if its gonna work or not :3
Added timestamp too to the model of Mock. Will use. Some day.
Dealt with timestamps. Phew.
Each mock is pushed to the database on creation. The code worked. Booyeah! xD
List of mocks is now loaded from the database and displayed using CursorAdapter. *yawn*
Updating workspace.xml Annoying Idea gives me no option :/
Changed the formatting of timestamps. I really need to find better things to do.
Moved the FlowNamingActivity to a DialogFragment. Time wasted = ~2 hours.
Can now resize selection by dragging on the corners. That was fun :D
Variables that need to be available globally will now be listed in the Application class. Feels like a hack :/
Added an extra button to mark the end of the process. Done.
Incorporated new database schema into the app. So much work left. Uff.
Got rid off SharedPreferences. Global variables will now be defined in MockPlayerApplication. Now to get crackin'.
Screens now pushed on selecting an image. Also got rid off some issues pertaining to database locks. One step closer to the edge.
Chained image selections. Bugs bugs bugs. Gotta squash 'em all!
Saves entire flow, with actions. Now to deal with the backstack bug :|
Fully functional backstack! Yai! :D
Added missing XML files. Did not know that Idea ignored them forever if I refused to add them to Git the first time :/
Demo model of what the Mock-Player will look like. -_-
Fixed the issue related to database locks by simply changing one line of code. Really? :/
Fixed the image co-ordinates on selection. Its now relative with respect to the image. Not to forget other insignificant changes which will become significant with the next couple of commits.
Minor refactoring
Dealt with the back button. Added support for multi-directional flows.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
